channel.title: I need help making a basic server for myself!
channel.description: Plz help me, and NO FLAMING!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: Plz tell me, even just some basic Java knowledge would help!!! Again, plzplzplz help me!

item.title: I need help making a basic server for myself!
item.dc:creator: @Blazpkr Blazpkr
item.description:
@Blazpkr wrote:

Ok dude first of all theres many tutorials on making a new server. Go on RS2 server tutorials. And there will be a tut about making a server. Really simple I suggest gettign a source first of all there are many out there personally i use Testscape. But Cheezscape or any others should do. So in the search bar at the top search Testscape and you should be able to find a link to download it. If you need anymore help post again. But take a look first man it may help you out

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making a basic server for myself!

like codeing and stuff?? what do you want?? it be easyer to look for stuff that sounds interesting in the tutorial section. try codeing some simple stuff first. its hard to screw up if you follow everything exactly how it says.
